tools/configure.sh - libcspec_book

Table of Contents
  1. # Copyright (c) 2013 The libcspec Authors. All rights reserved.
  2. # Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that can be
  3. # found in the LICENSE file. See the AUTHORS file for names of contributors.
  4. ###############################################################################
  5. #!/bin/sh
  6. #
  7. # Detects OS we're compiling on and outputs a file specified by the first
  8. # argument, which in turn gets read while processing Makefile.
  9. #
  10. # The output will set the following variables:
  11. #   AR                          Archiver
  12. #   CC                          C Compiler path
  13. #   CXX                         C++ Compiler path
  14. #   CC_LD                       C Linker
  15. #   CXX_LD                      C++ Linker
  16. #   PLATFORM_LDFLAGS            Linker flags
  17. #   PLATFORM_LIBS               Libraries flags
  18. #   PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT         Extension for shared libraries
  19. #   PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS     Flags for building shared library
  20. #                               This flag is embedded just before the name
  21. #                               of the shared library without intervening spaces
  22. #   PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS      Flags for compiling objects for shared library
  23. #   PLATFORM_CCFLAGS            C compiler flags
  24. #   PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS           C++ compiler flags.  Will contain:
  25. #   PLATFORM_SHARED_VERSIONED   Set to 'true' if platform supports versioned
  26. #                               shared libraries, empty otherwise.
  27. #
  28. # The PLATFORM_CCFLAGS and PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS might include the following:
  29. #

  31. OUTPUT=$1
  32. PREFIX=$2
  33. FORCE=$3
  34. if test -z "$OUTPUT" || test -z "$PREFIX"; then
  35.     echo "usage: $0 <output-filename> <directory_prefix> [-f]" >&2
  36.     exit 1
  37. fi

  39. # Delete existing output, if it exists
  40. OUTPUT=$PREFIX/$OUTPUT

  42. if test -f $OUTPUT -a -z "$FORCE"; then
  43.     exit 0
  44. fi

  46. rm -f $OUTPUT
  47. touch $OUTPUT

  49. if test -z "$AR"; then
  50.     AR=ar
  51. fi

  53. if test -z "$CC"; then
  54.     CC=cc
  55. fi

  57. if test -z "$CXX"; then
  58.     CXX=g++
  59. fi

  61. if test -z "$LD"; then
  62.     LD=ld
  63. fi

  65. CC_LD=$LD
  66. CXX_LD=$LD

  68. # Detect OS
  69. if test -z "$TARGET_OS"; then
  70.     TARGET_OS=`uname -s`
  71. fi

  73. # Detect machine hardware name
  74. if test -z "$TARGET_M"; then
  75.     TARGET_M=`uname -m`
  76. fi

  78. ARFLAGS=rcu
  79. COMMON_FLAGS=
  80. CROSS_COMPILE=
  81. PLATFORM_CCFLAGS=
  82. PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS=
  83. PLATFORM_LDFLAGS=
  84. PLATFORM_LIBS=
  85. PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT="so"
  86. PLATFORM_STATIC_EXT="a"
  87. PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS="-shared -Wl,-soname -Wl,"
  88. PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS=
  89. PLATFORM_SHARED_VERSIONED=true
  90. ECHO_OPT=

  92. case "$TARGET_OS" in
  93.     AIX)
  94.         CC=xlc
  95.         CXX=xlC
  96.         ARFLAGS= -X64 rcu
  97.         PLATFORM=OS_IBMAIX
  98.         COMMON_FLAGS="-DOS_AIX"
  99.         PLATFORM_CCFLAGS="-q64 -D_THREAD_SAFE -D_H_LOCALEDEF"
  100.         PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS="-qrtti -q64 -D_THREAD_SAFE"
  101.         PLATFORM_LDFLAGS="-brtl -bexpall"
  102.         PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS="-b64 -G -bnoentry -brtl -bexpall"
  103.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread -lodm -lcfg -lrt -lm"
  104.         ;;
  105.     Darwin)
  106.         PLATFORM=OS_MACOSX
  107.         COMMON_FLAGS="-DOS_MACOSX"
  108.         PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT=dylib
  109.         [ -z "$INSTALL_PATH" ] && INSTALL_PATH=`pwd`
  110.         PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS="-dynamiclib -single_module -undefined dynamic_lookup -install_name $INSTALL_PATH/"
  111.         ;;
  112.     Linux)
  113.         PLATFORM=OS_LINUX
  114.         CXX_LD=$CXX
  115.         CC_LD=$CC
  116.         COMMON_FLAGS="-O2 -pthread -DOS_LINUX -fPIC"
  117.         PLATFORM_LDFLAGS="-lpthread -Wl,-E -ldl"
  118.         PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS="-fPIC"
  119.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-ldl -lm"
  120.         ECHO_OPT="-e"
  121.         ;;
  122.     SunOS)
  123.         PLATFORM=OS_SOLARIS
  124.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_SOLARIS"
  125.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread -lsocket -lnsl -lrt"
  126.         ;;
  127.     FreeBSD)
  128.         PLATFORM=OS_FREEBSD
  129.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_FREEBSD"
  130.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread"
  131.         ;;
  132.     NetBSD)
  133.         PLATFORM=OS_NETBSD
  134.         CC_LD=$CC
  135.         CXX_LD=$CXX
  136.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_NETBSD"
  137.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread -lgcc_s"
  138.         ;;
  139.     OpenBSD)
  140.         PLATFORM=OS_OPENBSD
  141.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_OPENBSD"
  142.         PLATFORM_LDFLAGS="-pthread"
  143.         ;;
  144.     DragonFly)
  145.         PLATFORM=OS_DRAGONFLYBSD
  146.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_DRAGONFLYBSD"
  147.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread"
  148.         ;;
  149.     OS_ANDROID_CROSSCOMPILE)
  150.         PLATFORM=OS_ANDROID
  151.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_ANDROID -DLEVELDB_PLATFORM_POSIX"
  152.         PLATFORM_LDFLAGS=""  # All pthread features are in the Android C library
  153.         CROSS_COMPILE=true
  154.         ;;
  155.     HP-UX)
  156.         PLATFORM=OS_HPUX
  157.         CXX=aCC
  158.         PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT="sl"
  159.         COMMON_FLAGS="-DOS_HPUX"
  160.         if test "$TARGET_M" = "ia64"; then
  161.             PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS=" +DD64 \
  162.                                 -AA \
  163.                                 -Wl,-E \
  164.                                 -D_RWSTD_MULTI_THREAD -D_REENTRANT \
  165.                                 +W829,749 \
  166.                                 -D__HP_NO_MATH_OVERLOADS \
  167.                                 -D__HPACC_STRICTER_ANSI__ \
  168.                                 -D__HPACC_USING_MULTIPLIES_IN_FUNCTIONAL\
  169.                                 +inst_implicit_include"

  171.             PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS="-b"
  172.             PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread -lxti -lm -lrt"

  174.         else
  175.             PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS=" -AA +z -lstd_v2 -lCsup_v2 \
  176.                                 -Wl,-E \
  177.                                 -D_RWSTD_MULTI_THREAD -D_REENTRANT \
  178.                                 +W829,749 \
  179.                                 -D__HP_NO_MATH_OVERLOADS \
  180.                                 -D__HPACC_STRICTER_ANSI__ \
  181.                                 -D__HPACC_USING_MULTIPLIES_IN_FUNCTIONAL \
  182.                                 +inst_implicit_include"

  184.             PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS="-b -lc"
  185.             PLATFORM_LIBS="-lpthread -lxti -lm -lc -lrt"
  186.         fi
  187.         ;;
  188.     OSF1)
  189.         PLATFORM=OS_COMPAQ
  190.         CXX=cxx
  191.         COMMON_FLAGS="-D_REENTRANT -DOS_COMPAQ"
  192.         PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS="-D__USE_STD_IOSTREAM -D_POSIX_PII_SOCKET -D_SOCKADDR_LEN"
  193.         PLATFORM_LDFLAGS="-pthread"
  194.         PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS="-shared -no_archive -lc"
  195.         PLATFORM_LIBS="-lm"
  196.         ;;
  197.     *)
  198.         echo "Unknown platform!" >&2
  199.         exit 1
  200. esac

  202. MEMCMP_FLAG=
  203. if test "$CXX" = "g++"; then
  204.     # Use libc's memcmp instead of GCC's memcmp.  This results in ~40%
  205.     # performance improvement on readrandom under gcc 4.4.3 on Linux/x86.
  206.     MEMCMP_FLAG="-fno-builtin-memcmp"
  207. fi

  209. COMMON_FLAGS="$COMMON_FLAGS $MEMCMP_FLAG"
  210. PLATFORM_CCFLAGS="$PLATFORM_CCFLAGS $COMMON_FLAGS"
  211. PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS="$PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS $COMMON_FLAGS"

  213. echo "CC=$CC" >> $OUTPUT
  214. echo "CXX=$CXX" >> $OUTPUT
  215. echo "CC_LD=$CC_LD" >> $OUTPUT
  216. echo "CXX_LD=$CXX_LD" >> $OUTPUT
  217. echo "AR=$AR" >> $OUTPUT
  218. echo "ARFLAGS=$ARFLAGS" >> $OUTPUT
  219. echo "PLATFORM=$PLATFORM" >> $OUTPUT
  220. echo "PLATFORM_LDFLAGS=$PLATFORM_LDFLAGS" >> $OUTPUT
  221. echo "PLATFORM_LIBS=$PLATFORM_LIBS" >> $OUTPUT
  222. echo "PLATFORM_CCFLAGS=$PLATFORM_CCFLAGS" >> $OUTPUT
  223. echo "PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS=$PLATFORM_CXXFLAGS" >> $OUTPUT
  224. echo "PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS=$PLATFORM_SHARED_CFLAGS" >> $OUTPUT
  225. echo "PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT=$PLATFORM_SHARED_EXT" >> $OUTPUT
  226. echo "PLATFORM_STATIC_EXT=$PLATFORM_STATIC_EXT" >> $OUTPUT
  227. echo "PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS=$PLATFORM_SHARED_LDFLAGS" >> $OUTPUT
  228. echo "PLATFORM_SHARED_VERSIONED=$PLATFORM_SHARED_VERSIONED" >> $OUTPUT
  229. echo "ECHO_OPT=$ECHO_OPT" >> $OUTPUT
  230. echo "" >> $OUTPUT

  232. cat $OUTPUT
